name: PlotTreeWithAPE_ExportTree_Bob

outputs.description: R-based plot of a tree and export nexus
outputs.name: treePlot

script:
library(geiger)
library(cardoonTools)

picplot <- function(mytree){
  plot(mytree,type="phylogram",use.edge.length=TRUE,show.tip.label=TRUE)
}

treePlot = cardoonPlot(expression(picplot(tree)), width=1000, height=1000, res=100)
treePlot = treePlot$png

string.tree<-write.tree(tree)
